activities: Broadridge (Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc., Broadridge Securities Processing Solutions, Inc., Broadridge Investor Communication Solutions, Inc.,  Broadridge Output Solutions, Inc., Broadridge Corporate Issuer Solutions, Inc. and Access Data Corp.) provides data processing services in connection with providing shareholder communications for public companies and mutual funds and investor communications for banks and broker-dealers.  Broadridge also provides securities transaction processing on behalf of banks and broker-dealers and the related investor communications.  In connection with the foregoing, Broadridge handles personal information of shareholders and investors, including data subjects in Europe.  Broadridge processes information on these data subjects as instructed by its clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online and offline personal information received from Broadridge's clients via its licensed applications and service programs.
recoursemech: International Centre for Dispute Resolution/American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA)
